name: Merlin
subtitle: Squirrel
author: Brian Weisz

additional_info.title: FAQ for all Merlin animal forms
additional_info.body:
Q: If Merlin is chosen by the effect of Let it Go and placed into my inkwell does his ability trigger?

A: Yes it does. Being placed into the inkwell facedown is treated as leaving play

flavor_text: You canâ€™t always trust to luck, boy.
rules_text: LOOK BEFORE YOU LEAP When you play this character and when he leaves play, look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.
